data.nombre: T-Shirts & Apparel : Hermione's Gryffindor Longsleeve Shirt
data.descripcion: Exact replica of the shirt worn by Hermione in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1. Hermione rocks the magic like no one else. In fact, without her, the Dark Lord probably would have taken over everything and we'd all be . . . snake food or something. And this is an exact replica of her shirt from the penultimate movie.
